mapper.update: UPDATE community SET commu_title=#{commu_title}, id=#{id}, commu_content=#{commu_content}, commu_date=NOW(), faq_cat=#{faq_cat}, COMMU_PHOTO1=#{commu_photo1}, COMMU_PHOTO2=#{commu_photo2}, COMMU_PHOTO3=#{commu_photo3} where commu_no=#{commu_no}
UPDATE ANSWER SET COMMU_NO=#{commu_no}, ID=#{id}, ANSWER_CON=#{answer_con}, ANSWER_DATE=NOW() where commu_no=#{commu_no}
UPDATE community SET answer_status='답변완료' where commu_no=#{commu_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE C,A FROM COMMUNITY C LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON C.COMMU_NO = A.COMMU_NO WHERE C.COMMU_NO=#{commu_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM community c left outer JOIN answer a ON c.commu_no = a.COMMU_NO WHERE c.commu_no= #{commu_no}
